```pddl
[
  (:action ask
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?target - entity ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?target) (resource_available ?target ?resource) (not (has ?agent ?resource)))
    :effect (and (has ?agent ?resource))
  ),
  (:action ask_for_moss
    :parameters (?p - player ?loc - location ?moss - fairy_moss)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (nursery ?loc) (not (inventory ?p ?moss)))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?moss))
  ),
  (:action ask
    :parameters (?agent - player ?target - location ?resource - fairy_moss)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?target) (nursery ?target) (not (has ?agent ?resource)))
    :effect (and (has ?agent ?resource))
  ),
  (:action find_container
    :parameters (?p - player ?loc - location ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (storage ?loc) (not (inventory ?p ?container)))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?container))
  ),
  (:action ask
    :parameters (?agent - player ?target - location ?resource - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?target) (storage ?target) (not (has ?agent ?resource)))
    :effect (and (has ?agent ?resource))
  ),
  (:action find_container
    :parameters (?p - player ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (not (inventory ?p ?container)))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?container))
  ),
  (:action fill_bowl
    :parameters (?p - player ?bowl - bowl ?item - item)
    :precondition (and (not (filled ?bowl ?item)))
    :effect (and (filled ?bowl ?item))
  ),
  (:action find
    :parameters (?actor - player ?resource - object ?location - object)
    :precondition (and (not (in_state ?actor ?resource ?location)))
    :effect (and (in_state ?actor ?resource ?location))
  ),
  (:action fill
    :parameters (?p - player ?container - container ?resource - object ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and 
                    (inventory ?p ?container) 
                    (not (filled ?container)) 
                    (suitable_position ?loc)
                  )
    :effect (and 
              (filled ?container) 
              (placed ?container ?loc) 
              (not (inventory ?p ?container))
            )
  ),
  (:action add_or_place
    :parameters (?actor - player ?item - object ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?actor ?item) (inventory ?actor ?container) (not (contains ?container ?item)) (suitable_position ?container))
    :effect (and (contains ?container ?item))
  ),
  (:action prune
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (contains ?container ?item) (grown ?item))
    :effect (pruned ?item)
  )
]
```
